submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        colors=colors+colors[:k-1]
        n=len(colors)
        b=[0]*(n-1)
        for i in range(n-1):
            b[i]=colors[i]^colors[i+1]
        
        #print(colors)
        #print(b)

        b=b+[0]
        s=sum(b[:k-1])
        c=0
        for i in range(1,n-k+2):
            #print(s)
            if s==k-1: c+=1
            s-=b[i-1]
            s+=b[i+k-2]
            
        return c
